title: Isle of Arran
name: Arran Brewery
directions: Brodick - located at the base of the footpath that goes up Goat Fell.
hours: Summer: Mon - Sat 10:00 - 5:00pm, Sun: 12:30 - 4:30pm; Winter: Mon - Sat 10:30 - 4:30pm, Sun: closed
content: There is an independent restaurant facing you in the main driveway, but walk around the corner to the Brewery itself for some generous free beer tasting and the opportunity of buying 8 pint jerry cans of some excellent real ale! Although not technically holding a licence, you can get away with drinking on the adjacent picnic tables. A brewery tour is offered at 2:00pm every day lasting for about 45 minutes.
